QuestData.Title: Artisan's Supply: Salt Deposits
QuestData.Description:
Are ye looking for work, miner?
I was talkin' to Haephesta an' she says the Artisan's Consortium is needin' salt for their customers.
Noo I'd do it meself, but, well, I dinna want to.
Be a pal and fetch 'em for 'er, eh?
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver $1oa Salt Deposits to Haephesta at the Ruby Lifeshrine.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Deliver $1oa Salt Deposits to Haephesta at the Ruby Lifeshrine.
